item.description:
Hello photographers!

Big News! We are going to try a New Meeting format!- Per several suggestions from members over the last few meetings, we are going to try a new meeting format...

The meeting Begins at 7:30 PM the Last Thursday of every month. So from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged!

The from 8:00 to 9:00 we will have a more organized agenda. A topic, a presentation, a group sharing of images, something related to Photography!

Then from 9 to 9:30 We will hang out again catching up with folks from that evenings topic. We'll clean up and head out by 9:45.

Not sticky or ridged just a but more "photo related" verses "social party" ... folks have told me they come here to share and learn more. I think this set up will really keep is going in that direction... keep us chating about our interests...

So there you have it- the big announcement! Let's try it and see what happens.

Having said this, we have decide that from 8-9 this meeting will be an open Question and Answer session. So please come with your questions about photography. You'll ask the question to the group and be prepared to hear several answers from different folks. It can be about light, cameras, lens, or other gear. (We'll save our PhotoShop Questions for next month.) With the amazing mix of people in the group you'll hear a lot of options!~ It's going to be fun! Those Nixon vs. Canon vs. Sony folks are going to have a blast!

No question is to small or crazy.... we'll tackle them all!

Please remember to bring a treat to share!

And Going forward we will be asking for a donation at the meetups of $5.00 to cover costs. However it's not manditory to attend - just please donate if you can...

Cheers,
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography September Meetup- New Format!
